title: I hate that Diana is getting played at IEM
body: Because I love playing her and now I'm gonna be accused of playing the FOTM and Riot will also probably nerf her now.

replies.body:
Except they didn't do that great as Diana.

Don't worry, she's safe for now.
This happened with sejuani and viktor for me.

This was my exact thought process when I saw Diana this weekend at IEM:

"OMG Yay Diana! A'ight bitches, prepare to #embracetheheresy!!!"
Wait...NOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!  Rito's gonna nerf her now!!"

*Sees that the teams that played Diana didn't do very well*

"Um...well...not sure how to feel now..."

She's been getting quietly buffed ever since the changes to Lich Bane.  I fervently hope Riot takes no notice of this.

> [{quoted}](name=Whitakker,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=A7XeAJaA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-16T17:51:41.106+0000)
>
> This was my exact thought process when I saw Diana this weekend at IEM:
> 
> "OMG Yay Diana! A'ight bitches, prepare to #embracetheheresy!!!"
> Wait...NOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!  Rito's gonna nerf her now!!"
> 
> *Sees that the teams that played Diana didn't do very well*
> 
> "Um...well...not sure how to feel now..."
> 
> She's been getting quietly buffed ever since the changes to Lich Bane.  I fervently hope Riot takes no notice of this.

Those were my exact thoughts too.

Their performance on her was lackluster. Both times she took teleport (no kill pressure). and overall the champion just go shut down.

Don't worry, FOTM is still Jungle Nidalee and no nerfs should come to Diana.
